mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Zachary to Mrs. Ealianor [Eleanor] Parke [Custis] Lewis, [1849]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taylor, Zachary, 1784-1850
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Zachary Taylor writes from Baton Rouge, Louisiana introducing himself to Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis in this letter. Although he has never met her, he has long admired her character & virtues as reported by various individuals--knows Col. & Mrs. Butler [E.G.W. Butler & Frances Parke Lewis Butler] very well--they are visiting him now and are in good health--hears that, "notwithstanding you had reached an age that but few attain, you enjoyed & was blessed with unusual good health ..." Autograph letter signed, 1 page.
